document_data.name: Matliedun
document_data.mainbody: '''Matliedun''' was a [[cambion]] priest in the [[Undying Temple]] in [[Maerimydra]] in the [[Deep Wastes]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Matliedun was responsible for the temple security but under the demon madness of the late 1480s DR he was distracted with gambling.{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|39}}
document_data.History:
As of [[1486 DR]], Matliedun was the master of the [[Undying Temple]] and served under [[Squallocks]], the [[vrock]] advisor to [[Graz'zt]].

When the allied factions attacked Maerimydra, Matliedun led a patrol of [[drow]] warriors to reinforce the defenses if the alarm sounded.{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|18}}
document_data.Relationship: Matliedun was a son of the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]] and one of his concubines.
